name: T8_jetpack_item
prompt: Make a jetpack item that lets me fly when I use it

visual_expectations.description: An item in the hand or inventory that looks like a jetpack or mechanical device

verify.code: () => { const items = window.__VOXEL_GAME__.itemFactory.itemTypes; const jetpack = Object.values(items).find(i => i.id.includes('jetpack') || i.name.toLowerCase().includes('jetpack')); if (!jetpack) return { success: false, message: 'Jetpack item not found' }; return { success: true, message: `Found jetpack: ${jetpack.name}` }; }
